data.name: Jesus Alberto Garzon Castillo
data.profile: I am an enthusiast of web programming, I am currently in my training process to become a full stack web developer, so I have followed the training path of platzi starting with Html and Css and continuing with Javascript and technologies such as React. I want to be able to create quality content for clients and generate projects that contribute to Colombian society.

experience.title: Bit Coin Layout
experience.description: The first project I developed with Html and Css. consisted of developing the layout of an application using the movile first methodology

experience.title: Simon Dice
experience.description: The project consisted of performing a logic based on random numbers and an array of data to complete a series of levels of 'Simon Says'.

experience.title: Platzi Video
experience.description: Through the web development school of platzi this project is presented, and at this stage I have had the opportunity to develop the layout of Platzi Video.

academic.title: Business Management
academic.description: I finished my carrier in Business management at La Salle university

academic.title: Web Developer
academic.description: I started my career in web development at Platzi platform and I will become a web developer as soon as possible.

academic.title: English
academic.description: I have my certificate in level B2 from the CLUS (La Salle language center)

interest: React js, React Router y Redux
